text: Write a short poem about your favorite season.
Describe a fictional planet in 3 sentences.
Invent a new holiday and explain how people celebrate it.
Write a tweet-sized story with a twist ending.
Describe your ideal workspace without naming any furniture.
Write a conversation between a cat and a toaster.
Come up with a new word and define it.
Explain boredom as if you're an alien visiting Earth.
Write a haiku about coffee.
Describe a superhero whose only power is extreme politeness.
Describe a sunrise using only sounds and smells.
Create a dialogue between a lost sock and a washing machine.
Invent a new emotion and explain when humans feel it.
Write a slogan for a time-traveling bakery.
Explain Earth to someone who lives underwater.
Write a 5-line poem about forgetting something important.
Create a conspiracy theory involving pigeons.
Describe a weather forecast for a magical realm.
Invent a new board game and explain the objective.
Write a breakup letter from the Moon to the Earth.
